diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $LK$ is $4x+3$ units.
The length of the line $JK$ is $6x-5$ units.
The length of the line $MP$ is $3y+8$ units.
The length of the line $QP$ is $5y-7$ units.
The length of the line $QP$ is equal to the length of the line $MP$.
Point $P$ lies on the line connecting $M$ and $Q$.
Point $K$ lies on the line connecting $J$ and $L$.
The lines $LQ$ and $KP$ are also parallel.
line_instances: There are lines $JK$, $JL$, $KL$, forming a triangle $JKL$.
There are lines $MP$, $MQ$, $PQ$, forming a triangle $MPQ$.
The lines $JM$, $KP$ are parallel and are the transversals of the triangles $JKL$ and $MPQ$ respectively.
The line $LQ$ is parallel to the transversal $KP$.
